text: sawtooth-arcade/battleship branch update: it's mostly feature-complete; hashed boards are on the blockchain with one-at-a-time space reveal as you play the game.   with Boyd's PR this morning, the CLI command shows the right boards (target and secret) for the current player.  still working on prepping it for master, let us know if you want to help.  the txn family could use some unit tests for check_valid() and apply().  Probably also doesn't pass bin/run_lint (haven't checked) yet.
